# ion-modal-controller

Modal controllers programmatically control the modal component. Modals can be created and dismissed from the modal controller. View the [Modal](../modal) documentation for a full list of options to pass upon creation.
docs: Modal controllers programmatically control the modal component. Modals can be created and dismissed from the modal controller. View the [Modal](../modal) documentation for a full list of options to pass upon creation.

methods.name: create
methods.docs: Create a modal overlay with modal options.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: options The options to use to create the modal.

methods.name: dismiss
methods.signature: dismiss(data?: any, role?: string | undefined, id?: string | undefined) => Promise<boolean>

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: data Any data to emit in the dismiss events.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text:
role The role of the element that is dismissing the modal.
This can be useful in a button handler for determining which button was
clicked to dismiss the modal.
Some examples include: ``"cancel"`, `"destructive"`, "selected"`, and `"backdrop"`.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: id The id of the modal to dismiss. If an id is not provided, it will dismiss the most recently opened modal.

methods.name: getTop
methods.docs: Get the most recently opened modal overlay.
